text:
NEWS: Baseball's proposal to play in 2020 involves testing all personnel for coronavirus multiple times per week, with results within 24 hours. MLB also expects to have access to some supply of rapid Covid tests.

A positive test WOULD NOT shut down play.

https://t.co/7boviSlMOY
